pr_title: [ISSUE #6116] fix the download links for and the sequence of source and sink

timeline.bodyText: I am really curious if this field is used anywhere.
timeline.author: vzhikserg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,15 +13,27 @@ module.exports = [
     },
     {
         name: 'cassandra',
-        longName: 'Apache Cassandra sink',
-        type: 'Sink',
+        longName: 'Apache Cassandra source and sink',
+        type: 'Source and sink',

replies.bodyText: I have checked it locally. The links all work well.
replies.author: sijia-w

replies.bodyText: This comment was not really related to  your changes. The type field is not used and maybe it makes sense to remove it in the future
replies.author: vzhikserg

replies.bodyText: Okay. Thanks so much for your reply.
replies.author: sijia-w
